variable.name: configs
variable.value: Linux Exceptions QUICK FIXED_BUGS_ONLY BOOST HAS_EXTENDED_FT_INTERCEPTORS

command.name: file_manipulation
command.options:
type=create file=ACE/ace/config.h output='#undef __ACE_INLINE__
#define __ACE_INLINE__ 1
#define ACE_STRICT_BOOLEAN_DEMARSHALLING 1
#define TAO_STRICT_ENUM_MARSHALLING 1
#define TAO_HAS_EXTENDED_FT_INTERCEPTORS 1
#define TAO_DEFAULT_MIOP_EAGER_DEQUEUEING false

#include \
